column5: today i took a trip to walmart, found a game for PC, Bass Tournament Tycoon... its actually pretty decent, ya im bored...

I have a Fishing Game for the PS1 called " Bass Landing" which is thought to be perty amazing by quite a few people who have played it.  It comes with an optional game controller which is like a fishing rod (shorter of course).  This game is a lot of fun.
I like EA Sport Championship Bass - its a few years old now, but has tons of levels.
